name: Indrunag
description: Paraglide in the beautiful and clear blue sky of Dharamshala and witness the beauty of Shivalik Mountain ranges and many more that Dharamshala holds.

name: Solang Valley
description: Paragliding in Manali, Solang valley is one of the best parglding destination in India. Paragliding in Solang valley is one of the most exciting adventure sports in Manali.

name: Bandla Valley
description: Bilaspur is a very good place for Paragliding.There is a big lake besides landing field that makes it a ideal place for doing paragliding.

name: Shivapuri Shimla
description: In Shimla, paragliding only takes place in Shivpuri and 22 km away from Shimla at Waknaghat.

name: Khajjiar Chamba
description: Get mesmerized by the view of hills,  forest and mountain from high above in the adventure of paragliding.
